price: Lẹ́yìn náà, wọ́n máa sọ (fún wọn) pe: “Èyí ni ohun tí ẹ̀ ń pè ní irọ́.”
arabic: ثُمَّ يُقَالُ هَٰذَا ٱلَّذِي كُنتُم بِهِۦ تُكَذِّبُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: thumma yuqālu hādhā alladhī kuntum bihi tukadhibūna
